Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Are you swallowing them whole? You're eating them so fast, are they even touching your tongue?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [with mouth full] Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Brownies is it? Hm. Pastry cubes made of sugar and fat? No thank you, I'll stick with my jerkie.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: So why did you come in here?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: To socialize. And inform.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh brownies! I'm taking two so I can parcel them up and eat them at my leisure later on, much healthier.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: You're taking two?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Yeah, um, but one of them is for Toby.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah why don't you send that to him in Costa Rica?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Um, I'm just gonna hand it to him right now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Heh, okay, weirdo.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Why is that, why is that weird?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: She said she was going to give it to him right now. [starts laughing]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [laughing] She's probably going to, cause they sit next to each other.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, they used to.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Toby works here again.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, can you imagine?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh no.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uhhgh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't know. What?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You should probably just meander back there; take a look. See if he's, see if he's back.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hmmm, dare I? [laughs] You know what? I'm going to, for old time's sake. [walks to the annex, standing in Toby's cubicle] Great practical joke Jim, you got me to go to the annex. [turns around and sees Toby]

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hi, Micha-

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: NOOOO! GOD! No, God, please no! No! No! NOOO!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [watching Toby at Phyllis' desk through his office blinds] Look at him. With his stupid face. Stupid... tan. No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He looks great.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well rested.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He looks worse.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Michael, is everyone okay?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh, well I'm afraid not. Toby Flenderson, of H.R., has made a sudden reappearance.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: I don't understand, is anyone hurt?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not on the surface, no, but I can tell people are disturbed, David.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Michael, you texted me, 911 CALL ME.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: All in caps. Do you know what 911 means?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I learned a while back that if I don't text 911 people will not return my calls. Um, but now people always return my calls because they think that something horrible has happened.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Now what I'm curious about is how you were able to go an entire a week without knowing a member of your staff was there.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I did not want to go back to the annex because that is where Holly worked whom I loved.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Also, it's icky back there.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's true. People say it's icky.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Okay, I have to go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: David, wait.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is there no way we can get rid of him?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Not without cause, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have cause. It is be-cause I hate him.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: You have to get along with Toby.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Goodbye, Michael. [hangs up]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Dwight comes over, starts to massage Michael's shoulders] Don't do that.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [pours something from the fridge into a bowl and opens the microwave, it is covered in exploded food] Oh, come on! [to the documentary crew] Do you see this? Disgusting.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: So, Tunes, you still gonna buy your old man's place?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, I am. Wait, how do you know that? I didn't tell you that.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ehhh no, I was just walking by your desk. I saw some email. I got peepers of an eagle.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's really not cool.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Kaaw!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: So Jim, you're gonna live in the same house that you used to pee the bed in?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, I guess technically Kev, you're right.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Today's a big day. Today's the day that I show Pam the house that I bought for us. Without telling her. But it's my parent's house, the house I grew up in and yeah, I bought it kind of impulsively. I mean, the price was good and I was helping out my mom. It's got shag carpets. I mean you can't blame my parents it was the 70's. And why would you want to buy ugly wood from trees when you can have paneling? And a painting of some creepy clowns that is apparently crucial to the structural integrity of the building. [tugs and pulls in vain at the clown painting] She's gonna love it. Right?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Could you guys all do me a favor and not talk about this until I tell Pam?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Whoa, you haven't told the misses about the castle? You're in for a spanking my friend. Myself and my lady? - no secrets.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Jim, don't listen to Andy. I think it's so romantic.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh thanks, Phyllis.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Where's your place?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, it's on uh Linden Ave? By the quarry?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Ohhh...

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Cool beans, man, I live by the quarry. We should hang out by the quarry and throw things down there.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Definitely we should.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [reading from a note on the microwave] "To whoever made the microwave mess:

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You want to see some really high caliber acting? Well, Mr. Kurt Russell, you are about to be served. [walks to the annex] Hey Toby, great to have you back, man. Seriously, just a, just a real pleasure to see you again.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Well thanks Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're welcome. Missed you. Missed you as part of our family.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Well that's sweet, I missed you guys too.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So Costa Rica that was - did you have fun? That must have been fun.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Well, um, it was amazing. It really was, thanks for asking. Um the beaches were pristine...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Nice beaches, pristine beaches?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: ...and, yeah, the whole thing was incredibly cathartic.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why'd you come back? Why didn't you stay?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: It was actually kind of hard to meet people I found.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I bet, for you.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: And uh, yeah, plus it was hot.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [shifting uncomfortably and sweating] Shhh hot, why didn't you get an air-condition-- should have gotten an air-conditioner for yourself.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Are you all right, Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, I am. I am.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I tried, I tried. I tried to talk to Toby and be his friend but that is like trying to be friends with an evil... snail. I feel like I'm dying inside. I feel like Neve Campbell in Sream II. She thinks she can go off to college and be happy and then, the murderer comes back and starts killing off all of her friends. I learned a lot of lessons from that movie, this is just one of them.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, just summarize.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, fireable offenses include:

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: When it comes down to it, it's a health issue. I should have written that.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Mmhmm, yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [looks up] Why aren't you as mad or interested in this as me?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh totally. Sorry, are we talking about the microwave still?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Are you inching away from me?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Reach your arms out.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [laughs and swings his arm out which doesn't come close to touching the reception desk] I'm always this close.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pamtown lady sing this song, doo-dah doo-dah. Hello, Pam. Jim may I have a moment with Pam please.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yes, I just have to take this call anyway so...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, oooh his mistress. No. I'm kidding. No one would ever cheat on you; you are the complete package, Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What do you need, Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, what I would like you to do is take this folded note, and deliver it to Toby Flenderson? I just want you to just react to whatever this note elicits. Do not read it beforehand. Can you do that for me?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Good. [Pam stands up and starts reading note] N-no no no, don't.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: "Please hug and kiss me, no matter how hard I struggle. I'm too shy to tell you that I love you."

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam. Pam, you gave me your word.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: [kissing Kelly against her desk] You did that for me?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Mmhmm.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Are you happy you did?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hey guys that's really inappropriate.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: [kisses for a little longer] What's up?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Um, I got some photos from Costa Rica if you want to see them?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Yeah, yeah I'll see them.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Toby can I see those? Ooh. [takes photos and throws them on the floor] What's the matter? What's the matter? You scared?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Those are fighting words.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You mad? You mad at me?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I hope he doesn't haul off and just hit you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Do you want to do that? You want to hit me, you want to punch me?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hmmm?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Huh? He might do it...

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Punch him, Toby!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I dare you to. Come on.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on. [making karate moves] Baaah!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What's the matter... haaaww!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hit him! Hit him, Chicken.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Yeah, punch him.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey hey! Come on, Ryan, who's side are you on?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ryan. Come on, man?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No do it, do it. I dare you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Punch him as hard as you possibly can in the face.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not, not as hard as you can, just a good, solid punch. Come on! Come oooon...

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I'm not going to punch you, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Are you really not going to punch him?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: No, why would I punch you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Son of a bitch.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: [as Toby picks up his photos] You should have hit him man, guy was asking for it. Once in a lifetime, man.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I thought you were going to parcel those out through the day

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [mouth full of brownie] Just stop it. You haven't done anything helpful all day.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: There's still one thing we could do to get Toby fired.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What's that?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [goes over and closes office door] Frame him, for using drugs.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Frame him?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, it's illegal, but... everything they do on The Shield is illegal.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I've never framed a man before, have you?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh I've framed animals before. I framed a raccoon for opening a Christmas present. And I framed a bear for eating out of the garbage.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Just seems awfully mean. But sometimes the ends justify the mean.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello. I've seen you guys around. I'm Michael Scott, Dunder Mifflin. How you doing? [they stare at him] Uhghh, so I guess you know why I'm here? I need to purchase something.

Quote.Speaker: Vance Refrigeration guy
Quote.Text: A fridge?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. Uh, I wanted-- I wanted to buy some weed? Some...

Quote.Speaker: Vance Refrigeration guy
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Grass, weed?

Quote.Speaker: Leo
Quote.Text: What makes you think we'd have weed?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I heard you drug-- I heard you dealt.

Quote.Speaker: Vance Refrigeration Guy
Quote.Text: [whispers in Leo's ear] Hey, just hold on one second.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm not wearing a wire, so...

Quote.Speaker: Leo
Quote.Text: Why would you even say that?

Quote.Speaker: Vance Refrigeration Guy
Quote.Text: [comes back up to Michael] Hey, that's gonna be 500 dollars.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How much? How many pounds is it?

Quote.Speaker: Vance Refrigeration Guy
Quote.Text: It's- it's two pounds. I'm losing money on this man just, give me the money. Alright, walk away.

Quote.Speaker: Leo
Quote.Text: Walk away.

Quote.Speaker: Vance Refrigeration Guy
Quote.Text: Walk away.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Hey, Pam? I just wanted to let you know; I'm totally on your side with the whole microwave situation.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I was just back there, to make some cup-o-soup; the thing is still a huge mess.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I know, can you believe it?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Yeah, it's crazy. But, I guess the thing is at some point, notes or no notes, someone's gonna have to just get there and clean it up.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I guess that's why we have a temp, huh?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Ah ha ha, oh no, trust me. I would just make it worse.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How would wiping it with a paper towel make it worse?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I-- I would find a way.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You've seen things cleaned before though, right?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I-- Pam, I am hopeless at that stuff I... I, uh...

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Hi, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey. I forgot... I forgot...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [on a cell phone in the hallway] Yes, I repeat a drug dealer is on the premisis of Dunder Mifflin. His name is Toby Flenderson [Michael opens Toby's desk drawer and puts something in it] and he recently returned from a mysterious vacation in Central America. I have risked a great deal to tell you this information. My name is Andy Bernard. Andrew Bernard, that's my name. See you soon.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Hi, we received a call?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I don't know anything about that.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: We were tipped off about a possible narcotics situation.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Here?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey, Pam. Hey I got this, okay? Hello, officers, Dwight Schrute, former volunteer Sheriff's Deputy. Listen, I may have inside information that someone is hiding drugs in this very office. [leads them back towards the annex as Creed stands up and starts to put him hands up and then relaxes them behind his ears]

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Just pretend like we're talking until the cops leave.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Those are real cops, real guns. I wonder what's going on. [follows them]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Officers, I reveal to you the perpetrator.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hey, what is this?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Search his things.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 2
Quote.Text: Sir, can you step away from your desk please?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 2
Quote.Text: Sir, please step away from your desk.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hey, what's going on? You don't have my permission to do this.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: They don't need your permission, Flenderson, they've got the company's permission.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hey, hey what are- why are you doing this?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh, you know what? I think that this... uh, this is probably a misunderstanding.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Don't search my stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Sir?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I have a reasonable right to privacy.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Save your whining for the jury there, Flenderson.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, let's just cancel this, okay?

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Sir, did you recently return from a trip to Central America?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Oh my God!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no no no... No, no.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: That was... I went to Costa Rica for a few months. What is going on?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, that was... that was legitimate. That was totally legitimate.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 2
Quote.Text: Check this out.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh God!

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: That is not mine. I have never seen that before.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no no no no.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Turn around.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: What is going on here?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: God! No, that's not... I don't know what that is. And I... I bet he has nothing to do with that!

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Do you have any weapons?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Of course not!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ahh, that's mine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No! Michael, no!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, it's mine.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 2
Quote.Text: Some basil. Salad dressing, I think.

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: Salad dressing?

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 2
Quote.Text: Yeah it's, uh, a caprese salad. There's a little bit of, uh, mozerella right there.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Are you kidding me? That's my salad.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So wait a minute, there's no drugs?

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 2
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Gahh, dammit! [punches file cabinet] Come on!

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: We got a fake tip.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Wait, officers, are you sure you don't want to interrogate him?

Quote.Speaker: Police Officer 1
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [following them out] You have laws that protect you in any kind of interrogation. Why don't you use them?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You must feel pretty good about yourself right now.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I didn't put caprese salad in my drawer, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Did you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Since when is it illegal to put caprese salad... anywhere.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: You know but the police could have been out there you know, catching real criminals instead of here searching my stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Are you kidding me? Are you kidding me, that's who you're worried about? You're... you're worried about the cop's time? You think I framed you, and you're worried about the taxpayer? Dah, God! Welcome back, jerky jerk-face.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You said you were leaving and you made liars out of all of us. So...

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I did leave.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, you did. And then you came back, which makes you the biggest liar of... history.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Well, I don't see it that way.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Do you want to hear a lie?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I think you're great. You're my best friend.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: [stops kissing Kelly] I can't do this.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Can't do what?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: It's not fair to you. And it's really not fair to me.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Wait, what are you saying? I broke up with Darryl so I could be with you.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: That was your choice; don't put that on me. I'm just going on a little trip.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh, can I come?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: It's not that kind of trip. I'm going to Thailand with some friends from high school, well, a high school. And if I don't do it now I'll never get to go. And I'll always resent you for it... you don't want me to resent you, do you?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: So you're dumping me?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Let's be adults about this. Let's have sex one more time. And if you have any extra cash, that would be amazing.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Okay?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [walking out of the building] Hey, do you mind if we make a stop on the way home?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Cool.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [getting out of the car] What are we doing at your parent's house?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I have a surprise for you. All right, ready? Close your eyes and now [spins her around once] open your eyes. Tadah!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I don't get it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I bought it. It's ours. Let's go inside, I'll show you inside. [walking inside] So if you can believe it I did it without a realtor. Saving on closing costs is good and, uh, we can put all the money to de-shag the carpet. Which I think will help, the color situation. [Pam walks over to the clown painting on the wall] Yeah, I am really sorry about this. I tried to move it but he is really nailed in there. Worried about art theft, I guess, lot of art theives in this neighborhood. [upstairs] This is the master bedroom but, I'm actually not allowed in here so... [shuts the door]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [outside] So I'm still in the process of converting the garage. It's got great light in here and I'm thinking, it could be perfect [opens garage door] for an art studio. [Pam looks around and then looks at him] Look, I know, I bought this without asking you and it's doesn't look great, I know that. And if you really hate it, I totally understand it's just--

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I love it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You do?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, I love it!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I mean, you bought me a house!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh my God...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You bought me a house!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, I did. [they kiss]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Um, do we have to sleep in your parent's bedroom?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, No, we'll just board that up. It'll be that weird spare room that people ask us about.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: And the clown?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, I can't... really can't move him.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What is my perfect crime? I break into Tiffany's at midnight. Do I go for the vault? No, I go for the chandelier. It's priceless. As I'm taking it down, a woman catches me. She tells me to stop. It's her father's business. She's Tiffany. I say no. We make love all night. In the morning the cops come and I escape in one of their uniforms. I tell her to meet me in Mexico but I go to Canada. I don't trust her. Besides, I like the cold. Thirty years later, I get a postcard. I have a son and he's the chief of police. This is where the story gets interesting:
